item.title: Machine Ethics – Welcome
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This is the first post on the Machine Ethics blog. In this blog, I and some guests, will be posting article-reviews, positions, thoughts, and (sometimes) news about the field of Machine Ethics. These may relate to the field of Artificial Intelligence, Philosophy, Logic, Law, Politics or (better yet) all of them!! If you want to […]
item.content:encoded:
This is the first post on the Machine Ethics blog. In this blog, I and some guests, will be posting article-reviews, positions, thoughts, and (sometimes) news about the field of Machine Ethics.  These may relate to the field of Artificial Intelligence, Philosophy, Logic, Law, Politics or (better yet) all of them!!

If you want to contribute a post, get in touch.
